abstract: The two former bank executives, Sallie L. Krawcheck and Joe Price, will receive $6 million and $5 million, respectively, under agreements smoothing their departures.
snippet: The two former bank executives, Sallie L. Krawcheck and Joe Price, will receive $6 million and $5 million, respectively, under agreements smoothing their departures.
lead_paragraph: Two ousted executives of Bank of America, Sallie L. Krawcheck and Joe Price, will receive $6 million and $5 million, respectively, under newly signed agreements smoothing their departures from the bank.

headline.main: 2 Ousted Executives of Bank of America Get Final Paychecks
